pr_title: KOGITO-2107 - Remove Quarkus version override for kogito-apps

timeline.bodyText:
we may keep this and just use

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                                  maven.runMavenWithSubmarineSettings('clean install', false)
          
          
            
                                  catchError {
          
          
            
                                      maven.runMavenWithSubmarineSettings('clean install', false)
          
          
            
                                  }
          
      
    
    
  

so that it doesn't fail, and make it just unstable (IIRC) wydt?
timeline.author: evacchi

replies.bodyText: I'm very sceptical about opening up the build like this, I feel that it can allow broken PRs to  get merged
replies.author: cristianonicolai
